titles.title: Port Modernization and Supply Chain Protection Act
Port Modernization and Supply Chain Protection Act
A bill to repeal the requirements of the Foreign Dredge Act of 1906 with respect to dredging and dredged material.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Port Modernization and Supply Chain Protection Act
This bill allows foreign-built dredge vessels to operate in the United States by eliminating requirements for such vessels to be U.S.-built and -owned.
